item.title: Spirit Airlines pilot arrested at airport on child stalking charges
item.description: Dominic Cipolla, 40, a Spirit Airlines pilot from Kansas City, was arrested at New Orleans airport and released on $12,500 bond for stalking charges.

item.title: Northeast suburb beats out entire country for hottest housing market in 2025
item.description: Realtor.com names Beverly, Massachusetts, the hottest zip code in America with homes getting 4.6 times more views and median price of $746,000.
